name: Beat Leap (crbarrios)
description:
This is my attempt to make a 2D rhythm-platformer game on Unity, and my submission to Mix and Game Jam 2020. 

The game is pretty simple, just jump on platforms until you reach the highest platform, but the platforms will be shifting on and off, similar to the rooms in Celeste where you get B-Side cassette tapes, which are also the inspiration for this game. 

The levels are randomly generated (Because I don't trust my level design skills).

Any kind of feedback and suggestions are appreciated.

Anyways, good luck to everyone in the jam!
